basic.Target Organism: [Ref.29670004] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC=2.34 μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 122225 (MIC=9.38 μM), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 4028 (MIC=1.17 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=4.69 μM), Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047 (MIC=18.75 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=9.38 μM);yeasts:Candida albicans ATCC 90028 (MIC=9.38 μM), Candida krusei ATCC 6258 (MIC=37.5 μM), Candida glabrata ATCC 90030 (MIC=18.75 μM);StigA6 inhibit 100% of the epimastigote forms of Trypanosoma cruzi growth at 2.5 µM;HeLa cell line:IC50=14.01 µM
